translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然とそうなっちゃうものなのかもね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's something that just naturally happens.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そんなこんなで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, with all that said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔教団は当時の各国に攻め込んでは占領。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon Cult invaded and occupied the various countries at that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸のみならずJAPANにも攻め込みまくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They aggressively attacked not only the continent but also JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついに魔教団が史上初となる人類統一を成すわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the Demon Cult achieved the first unification of humanity in history.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: GI363年のこと、ルーンさん36歳ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was in GI 363, when Rune-san was 36 years old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……これってJAPANの地で聖魔教団と侍が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...So that means the Sacred Demon Cult and samurai crossed swords on the land of JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣を交わらせていたということよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were engaging in sword fights, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、想像するだになんともすごい光景ねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, just imagining that is an incredible sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そんなこんなで絶好調な魔教団。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, the Demon Cult was in top form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市も完成させてその名を聖魔教団と改名
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They completed the Fighting God City and renamed themselves the Sacred Demon Cult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もういけいけぶいぶい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were all fired up and going full throttle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれは魔人達も倒すぞーと意気軒昂」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: determined to eventually defeat even the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーんてしていた時に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And just when they were doing that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり調子乗ってる姿が癇に障ったか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe their cockiness irritated someone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人側がオラオラと攻め込んできたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demons themselves aggressively launched an attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが、GI420年。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That happened in GI 420.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーンさん93歳の出来事ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rune-san was 93 years old then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで一気に魔人戦争に突入。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So with that, they plunged into the Demon War all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ準備は万全とは言いがたいけれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although preparations were still not complete,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを受けて聖魔教団側も奮闘したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Sacred Demon Cult fought bravely in response.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奮闘……したんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They did... fight hard, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後は私の後ろの画像を見てもらえばいいかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe you should just look at the image behind me from here on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「M・M・ルーンこと、ルーカ・ルーンさんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M.M. Rune, or Luka Rune-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誕生したのがGI327年のこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was born in GI 327.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてその死と聖魔教団の壊滅がGI452年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And her death, along with the destruction of the Sacred Demon Cult, occurred in GI 452.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こうして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 125年にも及ぶルーカ・ルーンさんと聖魔教団の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the turbulent 125-year saga of Luka Rune-san and the Sacred Demon Cult

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激動の物語は終結した、というわけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖魔教団の遺物などは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Artifacts of the Sacred Demon Cult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで後片付けでもするかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as if tidying up afterward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時のAL教がほぼ全てを封印したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were almost all sealed away by the AL Cult at that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖魔教団があったという痕跡は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Traces of the Sacred Demon Cult's existence

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来る限り消滅されて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were erased as much as possible,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 技術を伝えていくことも禁じられた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and passing on their technologies was forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後には聖魔教団があったという伝承や遺物が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, legends and relics of the Sacred Demon Cult

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の片隅で隠れるようにちらほら見つかるだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were only occasionally found hiding in corners of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……なんとも無情な話よねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's such a heartbreaking story, isn't it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだかしんみりしちゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really made me feel sentimental.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあ、あなた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またネクスト図鑑でね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: see you again in the next encyclopedia entry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついに来るべき時が来た……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time that must come has finally come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という感じかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's how it feels, doesn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、ヌヌハラ・キャベツです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hello, I'm Nunuhara Cabbage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、い、う、わ、け、で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-o, w-i-t-h t-h-a-t...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほい来たーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here it comesーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類と魔軍との全面戦争の時代よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the era of total war between humanity and the demon army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物界は魔人ケイブリスの手により統一された！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster world has been unified by the demon cave-lord!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、魔軍は総力を挙げて人類圏に攻め入る！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, the demon army is launching an all-out invasion into human territory!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, just imagining that is an incredible sight.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, the Demon Cult was in top form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市も完成させてその名を聖魔教団と改名
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They completed the Fighting God City and renamed themselves the Sacred Demon Cult.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were all fired up and going full throttle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれは魔人達も倒すぞーと意気軒昂」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: determined to eventually defeat even the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーんてしていた時に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And just when they were doing that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり調子乗ってる姿が癇に障ったか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe their cockiness irritated someone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人側がオラオラと攻め込んできたわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demons themselves aggressively launched an attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが、GI420年。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That happened in GI 420.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーンさん93歳の出来事ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rune-san was 93 years old then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ってなわけで一気に魔人戦争に突入。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So with that, they plunged into the Demon War all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 未だ準備は万全とは言いがたいけれど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Although preparations were still not complete,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを受けて聖魔教団側も奮闘したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Sacred Demon Cult fought bravely in response.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奮闘……したんだけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They did... fight hard, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後は私の後ろの画像を見てもらえばいいかしら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe you should just look at the image behind me from here on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「M・M・ルーンこと、ルーカ・ルーンさんが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M.M. Rune, or Luka Rune-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誕生したのがGI327年のこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was born in GI 327.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてその死と聖魔教団の壊滅がGI452年
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And her death, along with the destruction of the Sacred Demon Cult, occurred in GI 452.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こうして……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thus...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 125年にも及ぶルーカ・ルーンさんと聖魔教団の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the turbulent 125-year saga of Luka Rune-san and the Sacred Demon Cult

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 激動の物語は終結した、というわけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came to an end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖魔教団の遺物などは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Artifacts of the Sacred Demon Cult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで後片付けでもするかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as if tidying up afterward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時のAL教がほぼ全てを封印したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were almost all sealed away by the AL Cult at that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「聖魔教団があったという痕跡は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Traces of the Sacred Demon Cult's existence

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来る限り消滅されて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were erased as much as possible,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 技術を伝えていくことも禁じられた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and passing on their technologies was forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後には聖魔教団があったという伝承や遺物が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, legends and relics of the Sacred Demon Cult

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の片隅で隠れるようにちらほら見つかるだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were only occasionally found hiding in corners of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……なんとも無情な話よねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... it's such a heartbreaking story, isn't it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだかしんみりしちゃった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really made me feel sentimental.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それじゃあ、あなた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: またネクスト図鑑でね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: see you again in the next encyclopedia entry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついに来るべき時が来た……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The time that must come has finally come...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という感じかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's how it feels, doesn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、ヌヌハラ・キャベツです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hello, I'm Nunuhara Cabbage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、い、う、わ、け、で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: S-o, w-i-t-h t-h-a-t...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほい来たーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here it comesーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類と魔軍との全面戦争の時代よー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the era of total war between humanity and the demon army!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物界は魔人ケイブリスの手により統一された！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster world has been unified by the demon cave-lord!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、魔軍は総力を挙げて人類圏に攻め入る！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And now, the demon army is launching an all-out invasion into human territory!
